venue.name: Fearing Pond, Myles Standish State Forest

item.description:
Volunteers are needed to fill a variety of positions such as kayaks, water stations, etc. for this Sunday's Amica 19.7 Boston triathlon at Fearing Pond in Myles Standish. Last year's triathlon drew over 100 people to beautiful Fearing Pond. After the swim, bicycle racers will be whizzing up to the East Entrance and back and then they get to run the Charge Pond loop and head back to Fearing Pond.  This year over 150 have signed up in advance.

We have been asked to help out at the last minute for this event. The hours are early but if we can get enough helpers,  the company running this race will make a contribution to the Friends of Myles Standish. (The Friends is a 501 (c) 3 charity and more information about all of the work we do in and on behalf of the forest can be viewed at the Friends website. (link))

Will you help us out? We are shooting for 15 helpers.  It seems impossible but maybe with your help we can make it.

Volunteers who arrive at this crazy hour will be able to take coffee and other refreshments provided by Panera Bread.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Amica 19.7 Triathlon - Volunteers Needed
